text: François-Xavier Ortoli (16 February 1925 – 30 November 2007) was a French politician.Xnhuanet – News of death He served as the 5th President of the European Commission from 1973 to 1977. He served as Minister of the Economy of France from 1968 to 1969. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2007 deaths Category:European Commissioners Category:French Ministers of Finance Category:Politicians from Corsica Category:People from Ajaccio
title: François-Xavier Ortoli
